General.Name: Super-Dragon Engineering Plastics Co. Ltd
General.Description: Super-Dragon Engineering Plastics Co., Ltd engages in research, development, manufacturing, and sells of modified plastic products in China. It provides modified general plastics, modified engineering plastics, modified special engineering plastics, and other high polymer materials. The company also offers modified PP, modified PC/ABS, modified PA, modified PBT, modified ABS, and other product series. Its products are used in the fields of automotive, household appliances, electronic communication, electrical equipment, medical supply, bathroom lighting, office equipment, and new energy solutions. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Conghua, China.
General.Address: Longtan Jubao Industrial Zone, Conghua, China, 510945
